    <title>U.S. News - Ken Walsh's Washington</title>
    <link/>
    <description>A longtime chief White House correspondent for U.S. News & World Report, Kenneth T. Walsh has covered five presidents beginning with Ronald Reagan. Along with other U.S. News writers, he  continues to provide insight into the White House of Barack Obama and the world of presidential campaigns.</description>
    <language>en-us</language>
    <copyright>2016 USNews.com</copyright>
    <pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 07:33:44 GMT</pubDate>
